messages.startupErr: GanttProject failed to start. Please refer to http://ganttproject.biz/discuss to get support
messages.bundledJreErr: This application was configured to use a bundled Java Runtime Environment but the runtime is missing or corrupted.
messages.jreVersionErr: GanttProject needs Java 7 or higher. Please refer to http://ganttproject.biz/discuss to get support
messages.launcherErr: Java Runtime not found or is corrupted. Please refer to http://ganttproject.biz/discuss to get support
messages.instanceAlreadyExistsMsg: An application instance is already running.
